result.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
result.translation: (50) And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded,[1032] but most of the people refuse except disbelief.
result.footnotes: [1032]- Of Allāh's ability to bring the dead to life.
